articles.title: Firefox 86 will block the Backspace-key to go back action by default - Ghacks Technology News
articles.description: Mozilla plans to disable the Backspace-key "go back" in history action in the Firefox web browser by default in Firefox 86. Find out why, and how to restore it.
articles.content:
The Firefox web browser is one of the few web browsers left that supports using the Backspace-key to go back. Hit the Backspace-key on the keyboard to go back to the previous page.
